item.title: Shana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shana add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Shana add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Shana add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Shana add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shana add a quote by Julie Kagawa
item.description: "Oh, we're playing nice now? Shall we have tea first? Brew up a nice pot of kiss-my-ass?" -- Julie Kagawa

item.title: Shana add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "My bounty is as boundless as the sea, My love as deep; the more I give to thee, The more I have, for both are infinite." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shana add a quote by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
item.description: "My soul is full of longing for the secret of the sea, and the heart of the great ocean sends a thrilling pulse through me." -- Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

item.title: Shana add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is like an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shana add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "We know only too well that what we are doing is nothing more than a drop in the ocean. But if the drop were not there, the ocean would be missing something." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Shana add a quote by Hans Christian Andersen
item.description: "But a mermaid has no tears, and therefore she suffers so much more." -- Hans Christian Andersen

item.title: Shana add a quote by Hans Christian Andersen
item.description: "The whole world is a series of miracles, but we're so used to them we call them ordinary things." -- Hans Christian Andersen

item.title: Shana add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Full fathom five thy father lies; Of his bones are coral made; Those are pearls that were his eyes: Nothing of him that doth fade, But doth suffer a sea-change Into something rich and strange. Sea-nymphs hourly ring his knell: Ding-dong Hark! now I hear them,â€”Ding-dong, bell." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shana add a quote by Dante
item.description: "...ma gia volgena il mio disio e'l velle si come rota ch'igualmente e mossa, l'amor che move: i sole e l'altre stelle ...as a wheel turns smoothtly, free from jars, my will and my desire were turned by love, The love that moves the sun and the other stars." -- Dante

item.title: Shana add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning. The end is where we start from." -- T.S. Eliot
